thread.title: Sassuolo star Alfred Duncan gets another chance to impress in Ghana squad
thread.title_full: Sassuolo star Alfred Duncan gets another chance to impress in Ghana squad

title: Sassuolo star Alfred Duncan gets another chance to impress in Ghana squad
text:
Sports News | 11 October 2015 00:10 CET Sassuolo star Alfred Duncan gets another chance to impress in Ghana squad - www.ghanasoccernet.com Alfred Duncan 
In-form Sassuolo midfielder Alfred Duncan has been handed an opportunity to stake a claim for a permanent Black Stars slot in Tuesday's friendly against Canada. 
The 22-year-old could be handed a starting role in the absent of several key and regular players. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
